content.text:
# 1951 Holy Cross Crusaders football team

The 1951 Holy Cross Crusaders football team was an American football team that represented the College of the Holy Cross as an independent during the 1951 college football season.  In its eighth year under head coach Eddie Anderson, the team compiled an 8â€“2 record.  The team was ranked at No. 21 in the 1951 Litkenhous Ratings.
The team played its home games at Fitton Field in Worcester, Massachusetts.
